title: Trina Turk Women's Standard Halter Bandeau Tankini Swimsuit Top
features: DESIGNER SUMMER SWIMWEAR — This bandini swim top by Trina Turk flashes with a radiant floral print. The adjustable halter with gold chain tassels and flirty ring keyhole at the neck add femininity and fun. Enjoy the classic tankini fit for a smooth mid-section, and figure-flattering look. Removable cups included
FULL TANKINI COVERAGE — The full coverage fit gives you some stylish wiggle room to feel confident in and out of the pool, while still showing off your style and physique
COLORFUL TROPICAL PRINT WITH GOLD HARDWARE — Show off your summer tan in this trendy swim item that features a colorful, tropical flora design. New eco-friendly digital print!
CUSTOMIZE YOUR SIZE — Consult our fit guide by clicking “Size Chart” above to determine which size will fit you best
FOR MORE OPTIONS — Click our logo above to visit our store page and view this Trina Turk swim top and other styles within the Opulent Oasis collection!
description: Inspired by the cocktail and poolside lifestyle of the desert, the Trina Turk Swim & Spa Collection is full of the season's most casually sophisticated and "must have" swim silhouettes. Trina's philosophy is to create wearable, optimistic fashion that incorporates the best aspects of classic American sportswear. With her attention to detail and emphasis on design, Trina's swimwear has become known for its amazing fit and gorgeous signature prints.
